references.paper_title: Anytext: Multilingual visual text generation and editing
references.reason: This reference is among the most important since the paper introduces AnyText, which is a method for visual text generation and editing and it is used as a baseline in this study.

references.paper_title: Textdiffuser: Diffusion models as text painters
references.reason: This is another most important reference as TextDiffuser is a diffusion model that is used as a baseline in this paper for text-to-image generation.

references.paper_title: Lumina-image 2.0: A unified and efficient image generative framework.
references.reason: This reference is significant because LeX-Lumina is built on Lumina-Image 2.0 and it is compared against Lumina-Image 2.0 in the paper.

references.paper_title: Deepseek-r1: Incentivizing reasoning capability in llms via reinforcement learning
references.reason: Deepseek-R1 is a Large Language Model that is used to refine the image prompts, which is important for high-quality image and text generation.

references.paper_title: Pp-ocrv3: More attempts for the improvement of ultra lightweight ocr system
references.reason: Paddle-OCR-v3 is used to assess fidelity, quality, and text bounding box coverage, and refine textual descriptions, making it one of the top references.
